title: Ranked 10 game series
body: Can someone explain how the f this crap works? I won 6 out of 10 games. good scores on all games but yet still get shafted to bronze 4? which is cute considering some players in silver had less game wins and when I viewed their stats had worse scores?! Ranked solo que is broken.... and trying to claw your way out of bronze 4 is just BS

replies.body: isn't it based off of how good you done on normal up on the way  to lvl 30?
nope, not even close. Not related in any way.
oh I thought it went off the win rate ratio of those games plus the those 10 provisionals, my bad so what its just rng then?

It only goes off the ranked win ratio in the 10 placement matches (if you are playing without ever having ranked before)
If the person has played ranked in the previous season (like the person posting this QQ thread) your previous rank is used as a baseline and you suffer a small decline in ranked MMR. Usually this means that someone will begin a new ranked season with the MMR of the players 1-2 divisions less than they were before. They play the 10 games (with the first couple having the most impact on mmr changes), as they do the MMR shifts to try and place them in the appropriate skill category. At the end they get their ranking. 

For example: 
I was placed in bronze V last season after my original placement matches. I managed to get to bronze I at the end of the season and had a high win/loss ratio. I did my season five placement matches, winning 7/10 and ended up getting back into bronze 1. 

My friend did his original placement matches in season 3, where he was placed in bronze 1. In season four after the reset he was once again placed in bronze 1 but managed to climb to silver 1 throughout the year. He did his season 5 placements, winning 3/10 and ended up getting into bronze 2 (he had a little cry about it but has since climbed back to silver 1).

I lost 8/10 in S3 and didn't bother to complete the ranked 10s...

S4 I won 4/10 and got placed in B4...
My friend won 3/10 and got S5...

The world is unfair man, just deal with it without burning out yourself aye

Because it takes into account WHO you are playing, not just how many games you win.

I could play against a team of bronze 5's 10 games in a row and go 10-0. Doesn't mean im Challenger now, since Silver people would probably kick my ass LOL

Im guessing you were Bronze 4 or 3 last season. Ranks don't reset every season.
Its based on your previous rank...Like if your B1 Previous season and win 4,5,6/10 games the thing will think you belong around that area...like I won 5/10 and got demoted from s4 to s5
if you deserve to rise you will.
